metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000107 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: inets in Erlang possibly 22.1 and earlier follows RFC 3875 section 4.1.18and therefore does not protect applications from the presence of untrustedclient data in the HTTP_PROXY environment variable, which might allowremote attackers to redirect an application's outbound HTTP traffic to anarbitrary proxy server via a crafted Proxy header in an HTTP request, akaan "httpoxy" issue.

criterions.comment: erlang: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
